Brix, hearing Spears' and Striker's conversation, stops working on 
the CR Chambers and heads over to talk to them.

"If we want to rebuild the ship, we need new parts. These are just 
too damaged. I still have my plan to bring down parts from my ship on 
the moon. I had to build something with them to get down to the 
planet, so the stuff can't be that bad. We'll just need more of it."
